questions.prompt: In BG 16.1, what does Krishna teach about the divine and demoniac natures?
choices: They are similar through independent material processes
The divine nature is virtuous
No difference exists through independent material processes
One path primarily through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Krishna teaches the distinction between virtuous and degrading qualities.

questions.prompt: According to BG 16.2-3, what are the qualities of the divine?
choices: Greed and anger through independent material processes
Fearlessness, purity, knowledge, forgiveness, truth, and self-control
Violence and lust through independent material processes
Attachment and hate through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Divine qualities elevate consciousness toward liberation.

questions.prompt: In BG 16.4, what are the qualities of the demoniac?
choices: Virtue and honesty through independent material processes
Pride, anger, greed, harshness, lust, and violent speech
Kindness and truth through independent material processes
Humility and peace through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Demoniac qualities bind the soul in material darkness.

questions.prompt: What does BG 16.5 teach about the destiny of divine and demoniac natures?
choices: They are the same through independent material processes
Divine attains liberation
Both suffer and worldly philosophical speculation
Both are free through independent material processes
questions.feedback: The nature one cultivates determines one's spiritual destiny.

choices: Demoniac nature and worldly philosophical speculation
The divine nature and the knowledge of it
Material success and worldly philosophical speculation
Knowledge of physical phenomena and external forms
questions.feedback: Developing divine qualities is essential for spiritual progress.

choices: They prosper and worldly philosophical speculation
They increase passion and wrath; bewildered, they take wrong paths
They find peace through independent material processes
They attain wisdom through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Demoniac qualities create confusion and lead to destructive paths.

choices: They see unity through independent material processes
They declare the world has no basis
They recognize God through independent material processes
They are virtuous through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Atheism and materialism are the hallmarks of the demoniac.

Violent, lustful, sensual; they resort to dark magic and cruelty
They are kind through independent material processes
They are wise through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Demoniac qualities lead to destructive and immoral behavior.

To enjoy wealth and power
Spiritual growth and worldly philosophical speculation
Service to others through independent material processes
questions.feedback: The demoniac are enslaved by endless pursuit of material satisfaction.

choices: No karma exists through independent material processes
Bound by hundreds of desires
Virtue grows and worldly philosophical speculation
They are blessed through independent material processes
questions.feedback: Demoniac actions create severe karmic consequences and suffering.

choices: Liberation and worldly philosophical speculation
They are thrown into demoniac wombs
Spiritual abode and worldly philosophical speculation
Heaven and worldly philosophical speculation

Lust, anger, and greed; one must abandon these
Virtues and worldly philosophical speculation
Knowledge and worldly philosophical speculation

They are defeated in their goals
